categories: Category:Star Wars: Darth Vader (Marvel) trade paperbacks

nodes.text: Star Wars: Darth Vader Vol. 3 — The Shu-Torun War

Star Wars: Darth Vader Vol. 3 — The Shu-Torun War is a canon trade paperback that collects Darth Vader Annual 1 and issues 16–19 of the comic-book series Star Wars: Darth Vader from author Kieron Gillen. It was published by Marvel Comics on August 9, 2016.

The unstoppable march of the Dark Lord of the Sith continues! The natives of the planet Shu-Torin [sic] are revolting. And there's no way the Empire will stand for that. Darth Vader is tasked with leading a military assault against Shu-Torin! Could it be that his rise to glory has begun? But who will follow Vader into war? Would you? Then again, it's better to fight alongside Vader than against him. That's a lesson that the Ore Barons are about to learn…
COLLECTING: DARTH VADER ANNUAL 1, DARTH VADER 16-19
